section1.sub-title: In 2016 I earned a bachelor’s degree in Graphic Communication Design from the University of Cincinnati’s DAAP program.

section2.sub-title: I have a year and a half of experience working in design in the San Francisco Bay Area.

paragraph.heading: UX INTERN | FALL 2013, SUMMER 2014
paragraph.body: User experience design work that utilizes behavioral science un order to encourage people to use less energy. The work spanned a variety of different channels including, mobile, web, email and print. Responsibilities included user research, wireframing, prototyping, user testing and documentation
